```{r setup, include=FALSE}
#setwd("~/Documents/Viscaria_2025/Single_Visits/Exploratory_Analyses")

#load packages
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(reshape2)
library(readr)

#load data
seeds <- read.csv("Single_Visit_Seed_Weights_2025.csv", header = T) 
seeds <- seeds %>% mutate("Plant_Stem_ID" = paste(Plant_ID, Stem_ID, Type, sep = "_")) %>% 
  relocate(Plant_Stem_ID, .after = Stem_ID)
polfl <- read.csv("Single_Visit_Flower_Traits_2025.csv", header = T)
polfl <- polfl %>% mutate("Plant_Stem_ID" = paste(Plant_ID, Stem_ID,Type, sep = "_")) %>% 
  relocate(Plant_Stem_ID, .after = Stem_ID)
seedwt_fitness25 <- full_join(seeds, polfl, by = c("Plant_Stem_ID")) 
```
